title: Sexy Foreign Films Streaming on Netflix
text:
Throw on your silkiest lingerie and get out your best bottle of red wine â€” these are the things that go best with a supersteamy Netflix movie . If you're in the mood for a titillating, late-night international flick, look no further. The 19 foreign films ahead are riveting . . . in a sensual, touchy-feely way, if you know what we mean.
